column4: is it possible to have both the wired and the wireless connection to have the same static ip address and then use either one instead of 'both'? or should i just unplug the cable and setup the wireless with a static ip address? (i'm using network manager)
no each device has its own ip
i a LAN,WAN and so on an IP is unique
is it possible to set a priority of some sort in network manager ? that it would use wireless if possible and fall back on wired ?
